markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Call of the Green Man](/Feats.aspx?ID=2397) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body. Once per day, you can cast [_plant form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=223) as a 5th-level primal innate spell. When you reach 17th level, this spell can be heightened to 6th level.
name: Call of the Green Man

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 13" pfs="Standard" > Call of the Green Man Source Ancestry Guide pg. 43 2.0 --- You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body. Once per day, you can cast plant form as a 5th-level primal innate spell. When you reach 17th level, this spell can be heightened to 6th level.
